import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Form, Button, Col, Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './SelectionForm.css'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' function SelectionFrom({showForm, name, kayaks, time, route, value, submit, back }) { let selectionForm = null if (showForm){ selectionForm = (

{route} on {value.format('dddd')}, {value.format("MMMM Do")}

 Name Number of Kayaks Pick Up Location Start Time
{/* */}
);} else { selectionForm = (null) }; return (
{selectionForm}
) } export default SelectionFrom;
